subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter moved within two hits of 3,000 for his career, but the Yankees were feeble on offense and Bartolo Colon struggled through one of his worst starts of the season.
snippet: Derek Jeter moved within two hits of 3,000 for his career, but the Yankees were feeble on offense and Bartolo Colon struggled through one of his worst starts of the season.
